name: Flatten The Curve (kt1795, dfa253)
description:
You are the president and it's your job to help the people survive the plague!

Button Instructions:

Generate new country: A new game is started where the initial stats are taken from real-world Coronavirus data from various countries around the world.

New Rules: mask wearing, social distancing, and quarantine rules are enforced. While its safer for the people (mortality rate decreases), the lack of business means less money (money gain rate decreases).

Build Hospital: expensive, but necessary. Mortality rate decreases.

Increase taxes: money gain rate increases, but the people can no longer afford healthcare! Mortality rate increases.

Close borders: money gain rate is cut severely, but less travel means less disease transmission! Mortality rate decreases.

Open borders: money gain rate skyrockets, but so does mortality rate!
